Find Shop Restoration Materials
\n<Receptionist>This task has been completed, no need to do it again.
\n<Receptionist> Mr. Yamashita wants to establish a new organization store
at the former convenience store located in the northern part of the safe zone.
\n<Receptionist>If we can successfully establish a shop, the people will be able to exchange money for some food.
For residents who are not lacking in food, there will also be some scarce resources for sale inside.
\n<Receptionist> It's just that setting up a shop in this situation, we have to consider security issues...
The organization is missing crucial components for security equipment...
Rumor has it that there's a room in the sewers where such parts are stored.
Could you go and collect it?
Mission: Search for Security Equipment Parts
Reward: Safe Zone Store Restoration

<ActiveMessage: I need help...>
\N<Citizen>I want to ask Leader Yamashita for some help... but I can't go on an expedition...
I wonder if he would accept some other form of reward...
<ActiveMessage: I need help...>
\N<Citizen>I want to ask Leader Yamashita for some help... but I can't go on an adventure...
I wonder if he would accept some other form of repayment...
\n<\n[3]>I'm quite interested in hearing how you plan to reward me~
\N<Citizen>Huh? Just...
Just doing some cleaning and stuff...
<ActiveMessage: Do the task...>
\N<Motivated Male Survivor> Since Yamashita first established this organization, I have...
Rely on completing missions to acquire resources.
\N<Motivated Male Survivor> The more you work, the more you earn.
You can also give it a try and pick up a task at the Receptionist.
\N<Male Survivor> The resources in the safe zone are also running low...
\N<Male Survivor> Many people are thinking about escaping.
<balloonLoop:1>
setBalloonLoop 9 0
<ActiveMessage: About the types of tasks....>
\N<Citizen>The tasks assigned by Yamashita are divided into two types: exploration and collection.
Exploration is usually conducted in areas outside the safe zone.
Collection takes place in areas that have already been explored.
\N<Citizen>I’d love to take on exploration tasks, but I’m just too timid...
Collection tasks might update at any time.
I’ll check back every few days to see if there’s anything I feel like taking on.
Tasks are divided into two types: exploration and collection.
Exploration is the main storyline task.
Collection tasks are related to side quests.
Completing side quests can also unlock important storylines and events.
While progressing through exploration,
try to complete as many collection tasks as possible.
A
<ActiveMessage: About the types of tasks....>
\N<Citizen> Yamashita The tasks here are divided into exploration and collection types.
Exploration usually takes place in areas outside the safe zone.
Collecting is done in areas that have already been explored.
\N<Citizen>I really want to accept exploration missions, but I'm just too timid...
The collection missions might update at any time,
I'll just check back every couple of days to see if there's something I dare to take on.
The tasks are divided into two types: exploration and collection.
The exploration is the main quest.
Collect as Side Quest
Completing side quests can also unlock certain important storylines and events.
While ensuring the progress of exploration, try to complete as many collection tasks as possible.
